title: Roosterfish Beach Club Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy a fun and vibrant afternoon at Roosterfish Beach Club with poolside games, cocktails, and beachfront vibes on Pandawa Beach.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the pool, games, and cocktails.
Participate in beach volleyball or relax on sun loungers.

title: Roosterfish Beach Club Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of beach fun, poolside games, and delicious food at Roosterfish Beach Club on Pandawa Beach.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the pool, games, and club facilities.
Lunch with ocean views and fresh seafood.
Relax by the pool, play beach games, or stroll Pandawa Beach.
